Posts.Content: how is ev1 had a lot of company so busy hope evweyone well today day 19 im halfway ad then some no swelling no red yet no itching except for that mid infection in beginning this isnt bad i see hematologist on tuesday to see if i need tamaifin no definate answer yet suehope you are well luv hags ev1 god bless luv peggy
